name: 張嘉育
objective:
研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum and instruction. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.
